Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • info.gridworld.actor.Bug
        • Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Edible

    public class Ghost
extends info.gridworld.actor.Bug
implements Edible
    Represents a Ghost character in the Pacman game Ghosts move around and turn randomly
    Version:
    May 5, 2020
    Author:
    Cheryl Lin, Period: 2, Assignment: Final Project, Sources: none

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ghost(Pacman p, java.awt.Color color, info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld w, info.gridworld.grid.Location l)
      constructor to create a Ghost.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      controls the movement of the Ghost.
      void beEaten()
      removes itself from board.
      boolean canMove()
      if Ghost moves out of bounds or Pacman in PowerUp mode eats the Ghost, Ghosts can not move if there is a Pellet or Fruit, or Ghost eats Pacman, Ghost can move
      void eatPacman()
      removes Pacman from board.
      void jump()
      moves itself one spot forward in its direction
      void moveOverBigPellet()
      moves over the big pellet (does not eat it)
      void moveOverSmallPellet()
      moves over the small pellet (does not eat it)
      void turn()
      turns the Ghost right or left randomly

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ghost

        public Ghost(Pacman p,
             java.awt.Color color,
             info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld w,
             info.gridworld.grid.Location l)
        constructor to create a Ghost.
        Parameters:
        p - Pacman character in the board, needed because ghost interacts with Pacman based on certain traits
        color - color of the Ghost
        w - ActorWorld the Ghost is in
        l - location the Ghost starts in

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        controls the movement of the Ghost. the time dependent traits, like respawning and moving after it has been eaten and changing colors in Pacman's PowerUp mode are controlled here. if a Ghost encounters a Pellet, it moves over them (not eating them)
        Overrides:
        act in class info.gridworld.actor.Bug

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove()
        if Ghost moves out of bounds or Pacman in PowerUp mode eats the Ghost, Ghosts can not move if there is a Pellet or Fruit, or Ghost eats Pacman, Ghost can move
        Overrides:
        canMove in class info.gridworld.actor.Bug
        Returns:
        if the Ghost can move or not

      • jump

        public void jump()
        moves itself one spot forward in its direction

      • moveOverBigPellet

        public void moveOverBigPellet()
        moves over the big pellet (does not eat it)

      • moveOverSmallPellet

        public void moveOverSmallPellet()
        moves over the small pellet (does not eat it)

      • turn

        public void turn()
        turns the Ghost right or left randomly
        Overrides:
        turn in class info.gridworld.actor.Bug

      • eatPacman

        public void eatPacman()
        removes Pacman from board. when Pacman is eaten, the game ends and user loses

      • beEaten

        public void beEaten()
        removes itself from board. respawns immediately in starting position, but waits before it starts moving again
